title: Generative AI Medical Insights SaaS
tagline: Full-stack Gen AI application reducing medical insight delivery time by 50%
description: Architected and engineered a serverless RAG pipeline with LLMs for automated analysis and summarization of structured and unstructured medical data. Implemented vector search and enterprise authentication to deliver insights 50% faster.

metrics.impact: Automated analysis of thousands of medical sessions

title: Medical Conference Session Curation System
tagline: AI-powered solution reducing manual review from weeks to minutes
description: Designed Python-based solution analyzing 6,000-8,000 conference sessions using business logic and keywords, reducing manual review time from 1-2 weeks to just minutes. Significantly enhanced session insight delivery for strategic decision making.

title: Clinical Trial Analytics Platform
tagline: Centralized data analytics solution with 50% improvement in efficiency
description: Architected and deployed a centralized analytics solution transitioning from manual Smartsheet-based insights to streamlined Form Assembly and Salesforce system, achieving 50% improvement in data accessibility and reporting efficiency.

title: Protein Crystallization Optimization Platform
tagline: Cloud-based AI application reducing processing time by 50%
description: Developed cloud-based application using Genetic Algorithms to optimize protein crystallization. Deployed on AWS and Azure, reducing processing time by 50% and enabling remote access for 10+ researchers.

title: Atypical Parkinsonian Disease Classifier
tagline: Deep learning model achieving 80% accuracy in disease classification
description: Built deep learning model for classifying Atypical Parkinsonian diseases using MRI scans, achieving 80% accuracy in distinguishing healthy individuals from MSA and PSP. Collaborated with Penn State Health Milton S. Hershey Medical Center and deployed on Azure Cloud.

title: Enterprise Microservices on Azure
tagline: Scalable microservices architecture for KPMG International
description: Led team of 4 to deploy applications for KPMG International on Azure Cloud, provisioning 16+ services in microservices architecture using Terraform. Deployed containerized applications with Kubernetes, ensuring seamless scalability and 99.9% uptime.

title: PPE Kit Detection System
tagline: Deep learning system achieving 95.6% mAP for safety compliance
description: Built deep learning system to detect missing Personal Protective Equipment worn by workers in compliance with US Safety guidelines. Achieved 95.6% mean average precision at 0.5 IoU threshold using CNN classifier.

title: Virtual Fitting Room
tagline: AI-powered garment size prediction with 85% accuracy
description: Developed garment size-predicting model with 85% accuracy, superimposing clothing on consumer physiques to improve shopping experience. Patent holder for this innovative solution, potentially reducing return rates by 15-25%.

metrics.patent: Published in Official Journal of Patent Office of India

title: American Buddy - Student Companion App
tagline: Android app assisting international students in adapting to American lifestyle
description: Designed and developed Android application to assist incoming foreign students in adapting to American lifestyle. Leveraged multi-threading, Room database, GPS, and Network APIs to deliver user-friendly experience.

title: Infected VM Detection Algorithm
tagline: Optimized BFS algorithm for network security
description: Created optimized Breadth First Search algorithm with early stop mechanism to detect and isolate infected virtual machines in a network. Enhanced efficiency using C++ to minimize downtime, demonstrating solid knowledge of data structures.
